name: poker-monorepo
description: Poker game monorepo with frontend, backend, and shared packages

scripts.dev:all: pnpm run dev:frontend & pnpm run dev:backend
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:shared && pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm run test:shared --coverage && pnpm run test:frontend --coverage && pnpm run test:backend --coverage
scripts.lint:all: pnpm run lint:shared && pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend
